name: DAVE-MD
description: DAVE-MD WhatsApp Multi-Device Bot powered by Gifted Dave

SESSION_ID.description: Paste your session ID here (must start with Gifted~)

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Your WhatsApp number with country code

PACK_NAME.description: Sticker pack name for your bot

AUTOSW_VIEW.description: Enable auto status view (true or false)

HEROKU_API.description: Your Heroku API key for environment control

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Your Heroku app name (required for remote updates)

MODE.description: Set bot mode: public, private, group or inbox

BOT_PREFIX.description: Bot command prefix (e.g. . or ! or leave blank)

AUTO_TYPING.description: Enable auto typing presence (true or false)

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Enable auto recording presence (true or false)
